title: Google\Cloud\Functions\V2\RepoSource
name: RepoSource
description:
Location of the source in a Google Cloud Source Repository.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.functions.v2.RepoSource

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.branch_name
params.description: Regex matching branches to build. The syntax of the regular expressions accepted is the syntax accepted by RE2 and described at https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax

params.name: data.tag_name
params.description: Regex matching tags to build. The syntax of the regular expressions accepted is the syntax accepted by RE2 and described at https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: ID of the project that owns the Cloud Source Repository. If omitted, the project ID requesting the build is assumed.

params.name: data.dir
params.description: Directory, relative to the source root, in which to run the build. This must be a relative path. If a step's dir is specified and is an absolute path, this value is ignored for that step's execution. eg. helloworld (no leading slash allowed)

params.name: data.invert_regex
params.description: Only trigger a build if the revision regex does NOT match the revision regex.
